official_title: A bill to amend the Act of October 26, 1972 (86 Stat. 1181), as amended, to increase the authorization of appropriations for Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial National Monument, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Increases the authorization of appropriations for development of Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial in Ohio.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Act of October 26, 1972 (86 Stat. 1181), as amended, to increase the authorization of appropriations for Perry's Victory and International Peace Memorial National Monument, and for other purposes.
